title: Patch Notes
content: laying a developer's comment instead of the correct description. Fixed some technical text appearing in the Shield Steward Interrogation Log tooltip. Clarified the description of Phantasmal Force. Clarified that Unarmoured Defence doesn't stack with Mage Armour. Removed some superfluous information about the recharge time of the Quickspell Flinger feature to align with other tooltips. Updated the Mapped Terror tooltip descriptions to clarify that they affect followers. Clarified in the Animate D
